trans-unit.source: Represents the default version of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> created by the workflow runtime engine if no other WorkflowCommitWorkBatch service is added.
trans-unit.target: Representerar standardversionen av <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> skapas av workflow runtime engine om inga andra WorkflowCommitWorkBatch tjänster har lagts till.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> class creates a DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService object when the runtime engine is started if no other WorkflowCommitWorkBatch service has been added.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>klass skapar ett DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService objekt när runtime-motorn startas om inga andra WorkflowCommitWorkBatch tjänster inte har lagts till.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService class using a collection of parameters for initialization.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService-klass med en uppsättning parametrar för initiering.

trans-unit.source: The constructor is invoked when the workflow runtime engine loads services from an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktorn anropas när workflow runtime engine läser in tjänster från en programkonfigurationsfil.

trans-unit.source: This requests the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> to retry in case of a failed database connection.
trans-unit.target: Detta begär den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> att försöka igen vid en misslyckad databasanslutning.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a value specifying whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> will retry committing a work batch.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> kommer att försöka igen när en arbetsbatch.

trans-unit.source: Retries of work batch commits for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity> activities must be modeled into the workflow (usually using a while loop and exception handler outside of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>).
trans-unit.target: Försök arbete batch incheckningar för <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>aktiviteter måste modelleras i arbetsflödet (vanligtvis med en när loop och undantag hanterare utanför den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> cannot do retries in this case because it did not start (and therefore does not own) the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>inte återförsök i det här fallet eftersom den inte startade (och därför inte äger) transaktionen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>

trans-unit.source: Besides being set programmatically, this functionality can be enabled through a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Förutom anges programmässigt, kan den här funktionen aktiveras via en konfigurationsfil.

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to set this property through a configuration file, see [Workflow Configuration Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om hur du anger den här egenskapen via en konfigurationsfil finns [arbetsflöde konfigurationsfiler](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909).

trans-unit.source: For general information on retrying work batch transactions, see [Batching State Information in Workflows](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).
trans-unit.target: Allmän information om du försöker arbete Batchtransaktioner finns [batchbearbetning statusinformation i arbetsflöden](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the service should retry committing the work batch; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om tjänsten bör försöka genomför arbetsbatch; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Represents the method called when the workflow runtime raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Representerar metoden anropas när arbetsflödets körningsmiljö genererar den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method called to start the service.
trans-unit.target: Representerar metoden anropas för att starta tjänsten.
